about.intro: I'm a Junior Full Stack Developer and Junior Data Science Researcher with expertise in UX/UI Design and process automation. (Yes, I'm an innovation enthusiast, curious and a fast learner). I like working at the intersection of tech and business, turning complex problems into scalable solutions.
